general.title: Hi! I'm
general.subtitle: A Software developer and open source enthusiast.

frontend.title: Frontend Developer
resources: Developed reusable React components and libraries, improving code maintainability and accelerating UI development.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to ensure seamless integration of components into various projects.
Conducted code reviews and maintained a high standard of code quality and consistency.
Contributed to performance optimization efforts, resulting in faster rendering and improved user experience.

backend.title: API Developer
resources: Designed and developed RESTful APIs using Flask, facilitating efficient communication between frontend and backend systems.
Collaborated closely with frontend and backend teams to define API endpoints, data structures, and authentication mechanisms.
Conducted testing, identified and resolved bugs, and improved API reliability.

mobile.title: Mobile Developer
resources: Developed cross-platform mobile applications using the Flutter framework, leveraging its widgets, layouts and state management features.
Expertise in integrating RESTful APIs into Flutter applications, handling asynchronous operations, and error handling.
Experienced in debugging Flutter applications using tools like Flutter DevTools.

automation.title: Automation Engineer
resources: Managed Linux-based, overseeing system configuration, software installations, updates, and monitoring.
Developed and maintained Bash scripts for automation, significantly reducing manual tasks and enhancing operational efficiency.

projects.title: Projects
projects.tic_tac_vue_description: Play the classic game 'Tic-Tac-Toe' with one or two players
projects.todojs_description: Yet another TODOs, but using vanilla js instead

summary.title: That's me, in a nutshell
summary.parragraph: I like to create, test new technologies, break Linux stuff and find a way to fix it, and automate processes just to make my life easier (lazier üò¨). I enjoy biking, running outdoors, playing guitar, and playing with microcontrollers.

skills.title: Skills
skills.0: Maintenance and implementation of new features for apps developed with flutter
skills.1: Translating design mockups into responsive, pixel-perfect user interfaces.
skills.2: Contributing to the deployment process, ensuring the smooth integration of React libraries into multiple projects using tools like Webpack, npm, and yarn.
